languages.text: {n}По мундиру Инцендии видно, что его не меняли много дней — воротник засален, а кружево покрыто бледными пятнами пота. В воздухе витает легкий аромат стимулятора, какой дают вдыхать серфам, чтобы они могли трудиться вахту за вахтой.{/n}

{n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По мундиру Инцендии видно, что его не меняли много дней — воротник засален, а кружево покрыто бледными пятнами пота. В воздухе витает легкий аромат стимулятора, какой дают вдыхать серфам, чтобы они могли трудиться вахту за вахтой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy and the laces are stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple shifts without rest.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}只消看一眼因森蒂娅的制服，就能看出来她已经很多天没换过衣服了。她衣服的领子油腻腻的，系带上也沾满了汗渍。空气中弥漫着某种吸入式兴奋剂的味道，这种兴奋剂可以让农奴一刻不停工作好几巡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}只要看一眼因森蒂娅的制服，就能看出来她已经很多天没换过衣服了。衣服的领子油腻腻的，衣领的系带也沾满了汗渍。空气中弥漫着某种吸入性兴奋剂的味道，这种兴奋剂可以让农奴一刻不停地工作好几巡。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの制服を一目見れば、何日も着替えていないことが分かる。襟は油っぽく、刺繍ブレードには汗が染みこんでいる。空気は刺激臭がする。奴隷が何日も休まずに見張りの仕事を続けている時に振りまかれる臭いだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの制服を一目見れば、何日も着替えていないことが分かる。襟は油っぽく、刺繍ブレードには汗が染みこんでいる。空気は刺激臭がする。奴隷が何日も休まずに見張りの仕事を続けている時に振りまかれる臭いだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Una mirada a la vestimenta de Incendia es suficiente para saber que no se ha cambiado en días: el cuello está grasiento y el galón manchado de sudor. El aire está teñido por el olor de un estimulante que se utiliza para dar a los siervos la capacidad para trabajar varias guardias sin descanso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mirada a la vestimenta de Incendia es suficiente para saber que no se ha cambiado en días: el cuello está grasiento y la tela manchada de sudor. El aire está teñido por el olor de un estimulante que se utiliza para dar a los siervos la capacidad para trabajar varias guardias sin descanso.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Ein einziger Blick auf Incendias Paradeuniform verrät, dass sie sie seit Tagen nicht gewechselt hat. Der Kragen ist fettig, die Borten sind voller Schweißflecken. In der Luft liegt der Geruch eines Rauschmittels, das Sklaven einatmen, um mehrere Schichten lang ohne Pause durcharbeiten zu können.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein einziger Blick auf Incendias Paradeuniform verrät, dass sie sie seit Tagen nicht gewechselt hat. Der Kragen ist fettig, die Spitzen voller Schweißflecken. In der Luft liegt der Geruch eines Rauschmittels, das Sklaven einatmen, um mehrere Schichten lang ohne Pause durcharbeiten zu können.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Il est évident qu'Incendia n'a pas changé de vêtements depuis plusieurs jours : le col de son uniforme est graisseux et la dentelle, tachée de sueur. L'air est imprégné de l'odeur de la substance qu'elle inhale, un stimulant généralement administré aux serfs pour qu'ils puissent travailler des jours durant sans se reposer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est évident qu'Incendia n'a pas changé de vêtements depuis plusieurs jours : le col de son uniforme est gras et la dentelle, tachée de sueur. L'air est imprégné de l'odeur de la substance qu'elle inhale, un stimulant généralement administré aux serfs pour qu'ils puissent travailler des jours durant sans se reposer.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın resmî üniformasının günlerdir değiştirilmediği belli. Yakası yağlanmış, örgü süsü de terle kaplı. Havada, kölelere durup dinlenmeden nöbetlerce çalışabilme yetisi veren uyarıcı dumanın kokusunun izleri var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at Incendia's full dress uniform shows that it has not been changed in many days — the collar is greasy, and the braid trim is stained with sweat. The air is tinged with the smell of an inhaled stimulant that is used to give serfs the ability to work multiple watches without rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın resmî üniformasının günlerdir değiştirilmediği belli. Yakası yağlanmış ve örgü süsü terle kaplı. Havada, serflere durup dinlenmeden birçok nöbet boyunca çalışabilme yetisi veren uyarıcı dumanın kokusunun izleri var.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
